de.unlixx.runpng.scene

Class DualUseMenuItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.control.MenuItem
      • de.unlixx.runpng.scene.DualUseMenuItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class DualUseMenuItem
extends javafx.scene.control.MenuItem
    Implementation of a DualUseMenuItem. This kind of MenuItem has a set of two image icons and two ids. It will be used in a rare case where one MenuItem at one place has to be used either for one funtionality or for another one.
